# init(unsafeWithTaggedBuffers:)

**Initializer**

Create a ready sample buffer with tagged buffers content from an existing sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(unsafeWithTaggedBuffers unsafeBuffer: sending CMSampleBuffer)
```
